data.name: Regional Scrum Gathering 2019
data.description: Agile Nepal is an Open Agile Community that provides an opportunity to Agile coaches, practitioners, followers, enthusiasts, and learners who would like to connect, discuss, learn and share their own experiences adopting or implementing Agile in their organizations.

relatedRecords.name: Web Weekend Kathmandu
relatedRecords.description: wwktm is an effort to gather experts, both national and international, and create an environment for new partnerships, collaborations and learning groups to be formed. We want to create a space that encourages participation and then the dynamics of the group will take over the direction.

relatedRecords.name: SharePoint Saturday Dubai 2020
relatedRecords.description: Administrators, end-users, architects, developers, and other professionals that work with Microsoft Collaboration or Cloud Technologies will meet to share the latest information for working with SharePoint, Microsoft365, the Power Platform and related offerings from Microsoft.

relatedRecords.name: DevFest Ranchi 2019
relatedRecords.description: DevFests are large, community-run developer events happening around the globe focused on community building and learning about Google’s technologies. Hosted by GDG Ranchi, DevFest Ranchi will cover multiple product areas such as Android, Google Assistant, Firebase / Identity, Google Cloud Platform, …
